plugins.name: folder-content
plugins.description: lists all the file in a given folder named 'folder'

plugins.name: compile
plugins.description: compile a the files in the array 'file_names' into a program called 'program_name'. The 'lto' parameter activate the LTO optimization and it is either true or false.

plugins.name: execute
plugins.description: execute the program called 'program_name' on the array called 'parameters' and returns the execution statistics.
